TopicTitle: Looking for a mod that had mini ion engines

Articles.Content: I remember there being a mod that had very small ion thrusters with a new model (i.e. not just a resized PB-ION). I can't find it anymore however. Does anyone remember this mod and its name?
not sure what you mean by that, but I know of Hybrid Ion pack but that prob not what your looking for. Then theres RLA electric engines and near future propulsion
Would it happen to be this mod?

Nope. It's older than that.

Is there anything smaller than the stock 0.625? I can't find anything even with the almighty google.
It was radially attached and it seem to look like it was about the size of linear RCS. Maybe it was a mod that was lost in the April Forum Fire or the image in my head is faulty.
was it radial ion thrusters, acts like rcs except uses up xenon and are very slow but efficient?
